Account_Name.description: Select the account related to the contact.

id.description: The id of the account related to the contact.

name.description: The name of the account related to the contact.

Assistant.description: Specify the name of the contact’s assistant. Note: undocumented type, assuming string

Asst_Phone.description: Specify the phone number of the contact's assistant.

Created_By.description: Displays name of the user created the contact first time.

email.description: Email of the user created the contact first time

id.description: Id of the user created the contact first time

name.description: Name of the user created the contact first time

Created_Time.description: Created datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Date_of_Birth.description: Specify the birthday of the contact to send greetings for a better relationship.

Department.description: Specify the department of the contact.

Description.description: Specify any other details about contact.

Email.description: Specify the primary email address of the contact.

Email_Opt_Out.description: Select the check-box to remove contacts from your mailing list so that they will not receive any emails from your Zoho CRM account.

Fax.description: Specify fax number of the contact.

First_Name.description: Specify the first name of the contact.

Full_Name.description: Undocumented - concatenation of firs and last name?

Home_Phone.description: Specify the home phone number of the contact.

Last_Activity_Time.description: Unclear: Possibly last user activity datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Last_Name.description: Specify the last name of the contact. This field is mandatory.

Lead_Source.description: Select the source from which the contact is created.

Mailing_City.description: Specify the primary address of the contact.

Mailing_Country.description: Specify the primary address of the contact.

Mailing_State.description: Specify the primary address of the contact.

Mailing_Street.description: Specify the primary address of the contact.

Mailing_Zip.description: Specify the primary address of the contact.

Mobile.description: Specify the mobile number of the contact.

Modified_By.description: Displays name of the user modified the contact.

email.description: Email of the user modified the contact.

id.description: Id of the user modified the contact.

name.description: Name of the user modified the contact.

Modified_Time.description: Last modified datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Other_City.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Other_Country.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Other_Phone.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Other_State.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Other_Street.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Other_Zip.description: Specify the other address of the contact (if any).

Owner.description: Select the name of the user to whom the contact is assigned.

email.description: The email of the user to whom the contact is assigned.

id.description: The id of the user to whom the contact is assigned.

name.description: The name of the user to whom the contact is assigned.

Phone.description: Specify the office phone number of the contact.

Record_Image.description: Undocumented, looks like a binary field.

Reporting_To.description: Select the person to whom the contact reports

Salutation.description: Select the Salutation of the contact, such as Mr., Ms, Mrs., or others. Note: type is unknown, assume a string.

Secondary_Email.description: Specify another email address of the contact.

Skype_ID.description: Specify the Skype ID of the contact. Currently skype ID can be in the range of 6 to 32 characters.

Title.description: Specify the job position of the contact.

Twitter.description: Undocumented, assume this is a twitter handle.
